methods.name: selectTrack

elements.description:
`a11y-media-play-button`
A giant play button that overlays the media in a11y-media-player

properties.description: label for play button on player controls

methods.name: attached
methods.description: get label based on whether or not the video is playing

methods.description: get label based on whether or not the video is playing

attributes.description: label for play button on player controls

methods.name: _buttonTap
methods.description: lets player know this button was clicked

elements.description:
`a11y-media-controls`
The controls bar for the a11y-media-player.

methods.name: attached
methods.description: calls responsive-utility to get parent's responsive size

methods.description: determine which button was clicked and act accordingly

methods.name: _onSettingsChanged
methods.description: determine which button was clicked and act accordingly

elements.description:
`a11y-media-transcript-cue`
A single cue in a11y-media-transcriptas static text or as an button that controls media

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: disable interactive mode that makes the transcript clickable

methods.name: _getActiveCue
methods.description: gets the active cue for styling

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: disable interactive mode that makes the transcript clickable

elements.description:
`a11y-media-transcript`
A transcript element to pair with a11y-media-player

methods.name: attached
methods.description: fires an event to let the page know there is a transcript container

methods.name: setMedia
methods.description: fires an event when media is associated with the player

methods.name: toggleHidden
methods.description: fires an event when media is associated with the player

methods.name: setActiveCues
methods.description: updates activeCues array and scrolls to position

methods.name: _getTabIndex
methods.description: gets the tab-index of cues based on whether or not interactive cues are disabled

methods.name: _getRole
methods.description: gets the tab-index of cues based on whether or not interactive cues are disabled

methods.name: _onCueSeek
methods.description: forwards the listener for transcript cue click to seek accordingly

methods.name: setActiveTranscript
methods.description: determines if this is the currently selected transcript to show or hide

elements.description:
`a11y-media-transcript-controls`
A controls for the transcript element

methods.name: attached
methods.description: calls responsive-utility to get parent's responsive size

properties.name: players
properties.description: Stores an array of all the players on the page.

methods.name: created
methods.description: Makes sure there is a utility ready and listening for elements.

methods.name: attached
methods.description: Makes sure there is a utility ready and listening for elements.

attributes.name: players
attributes.description: Stores an array of all the players on the page.

methods.name: attached
methods.description: calls responsive-utility to get parent's responsive size

methods.name: ready
methods.description: sets initial values and loads video or youtube iframe

methods.name: _getThumbnailCSS
methods.description: get label based on whether or not the video is playing

methods.name: _toggleSliderSeek
methods.description: handles slider seeking via mouse or keyboard

methods.name: rewind
methods.description: seeks media backward at a set increment

methods.name: forward
methods.description: seeks media forward at a set increment

methods.name: toggleCC
methods.description:
toggles captions:
toggleCC(true) to check the toggle, toggleCC(false) for unchecking, and toggleCC to toggle

methods.name: toggleAutoplay
methods.description:
toggles autoplay:
toggleAutoplay(true) to check the toggle,
toggleAutoplay(false) for unchecking, and
toggleAutoplay to toggle

methods.name: toggleLoop
methods.description:
toggles looping:
toggleLoop(true) to check the toggle,
toggleLoop(false) for unchecking,
and toggleLoop to toggle

methods.name: toggleMute
methods.description:
toggles mute:
toggleMute(true) to check the toggle,
toggleMute(false) for unchecking, and
toggleMute to toggle

methods.name: toggleSticky
methods.description:
toggles sticky attribute:
toggleSticky(true) to stick, toggleSticky(false) for unstick, and toggleSticky to toggle sticky

methods.name: toggleTranscript
methods.description:
toggles transcript:
toggleTranscript(true) to check the toggle, toggleTranscript(false) for unchecking, and toggleTranscript to toggle
